1.content: Alright, here are the age ranges that you can do for your characters.
1.title: Character Age Ranges

11.content: Here are some character spots for you.
11.title: Character Spots

choices: Go back to when they first met
Amyzilla is taking Amy for a ride on her head across the ocean
111.content:
Human Girl
Name: Amy Hoskins
Age: 6
Hair Style and color: Curly strawberry blond
Eye color: Blue
Skin: Fair-skinned Caucasian
Breast size: None
Clothes: An adorable red blouse and a pink hair bow
Personality: Sweet and gentle, but also very playful and energetic
Bio: Little Amy Hoskins has always dreamed of having a pet monster, and has often dreamed of having a big sister. Now she gets both!


Monster Girl
Name: Amyzilla
Height: 800 feet
Clothes: A purple skirt and a white shirt with mythical monsters on it
Powers: Invulnerability, nuclear breath, nearly limitless strength
Personality deviations: She is more assertive and gets mad if she doesn't get her way
Other info: She has an incredibly huge appetite
Bio: Amyzilla appeared one day in Amy's home city of Chicago. At first she was destructive, but when she saw Amy, she became peaceful. Now she is both Amy's big sister and her pet, and they have all sorts of adventures together.
111.title: Amy and Amyzilla

choices: Go back to how they first meet
We see both of them having fun in the VC on the island
112.content:
Human Girl
Name: Asuki
Age: 7
(for this one, the picture will explain all of her looks): http://www.writing.com/main/redirect.php...(she wears a pink shirt with a white skirt with socks and shoes in all other occassions)
Personality: A fun loving girl who enjoys giant monster films. She can picture herself as one, but she is nice and loyal. Playful for sure. Loves Girlzilla.
Bio: This girl always like giant monster movies. She can picture herself as a giant monster terrorizing the city. Well she got a heck of a surprise for sure when a giant monster girl appeared at her house one night. Thankfully the government came into to help, and the monster girl was moved to the island, but so was the family and the girl. She is especially close to Girlzilla (who she named) and they both have alot of fun together.

Monster Girl
Name: Girlzilla
Height: 130ft
Clothes for the monster: Refer to the picture. (http://www.writing.com/main/redirect.php...) "Note... the girl will wear now a yellow-one piece swimsuit, and not the bikini in the picture)
Powers: Laser eyes. Roars.
Personality: She loves Asuki, but she is really really destructive. Heck, she attacked the city just to get ot Asuki, and once Asuki stopped her, she became peaceful. Ever since the two were close friends ever since on the island together, and the family took her in as one of their own. She likes to play with her alot.
Other info: None
Bio: Just refer to Asuki's.
112.title: Asuki and Girlzilla

choices: Go back to how they meet
They are playing out on the beach
The Soyazillas and Soya are helping people around the city
113.content:
Human Girl
Name: Soya Soyula
Age: 6
Picture: http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111...
Personality: She is a truly cheeful, playful, fun loving, happy girl that can never be evil or bad at all. She is a child at heart, but a pure light girl as well. Heck, her monster girl sees that as well.
Bio: Soya remembered going with her mom to the facility that she works in that specializes in making giantesses monsters. At the time, mom needed a test subject, and the government would work the rest off with the details, so she tested her daughter Soya. The test was a success, and Soya has now a giant monster clone/pet/sister. At least they get along like a family.

Monster Girl
Name of Monster Name: Soyazilla(s)
Height: 130ft
Clothes for the monster: (http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111...) Same in the pick, but other than that, a one-piece swimsuit that is yellow.
Powers: She can clone herself and make up to 5 Soyazillas. (basically can make clone versions of herself, and they can fade at anytime to the original Soyazilla's will)
Personality info: She is the same as Soya, although thanks to her size she plays alot like a giant monster, plus she can be really helpful in demolition work and other stuff. Various uses for her clones.
Other info: Nothing much
Bio: Same as Soya's, but the two get along well with the people, and each other. Like I said, government makes arrangements, so everything is okay.
113.title: Soya and Soyazilla(s)

choices: Let's begin with the military incident
Let's begin with how they met
114.content:
Human Girl

Name: Vivian Dark

Age: 9, almost 10

Hair: Black and is kept long, also has two small side bangs

Eye color: Brown

Breast size: Flat

Clothes: A purple nightgown like clothing. You could say that she is somewhat goth.

Personality:Vivian is a very grim girl who likes creepy stuff like the grim reaper and horror films. She is a positive person, but not a happy go lucky type meaning she does smile. She occasionally has a sadistic side in her since she watch too much horror flicks, novels and other stuff related to it.

Bio: Vivian is a goth girl that is not really goth since she is somewhat cheerful, but not straight on. She is often bullied by her peers for being too creepy and how Vivian always scare people around her. Until she met her monster self, she lived a decent live with a caring family. Just terrible classmates.

Monster
Name: Grim(Name given by Vivian)

Height: Can alter in size, but when she wants to be very big, she is often about 175ft.

Clothes: Similar to Vivian, but more sinister and look more like a ragged dress.

Powers: She has the power over darkness and can manipulate shadows. She could also steal souls of any kind which she rarely does unless she needs to in order to protect Vivian or her owner says so. Vivian can either torture the souls or talk to them. Occasionally the souls would dissolve inside of Grim for a while and more on to the afterlife. Victims won't be dead unless Grim uses her ability to destroy the body or after staying inside of Grim for long periods of time. For the record, Grim often releases the souls about a minute or so later unless they are truly evil.

Personality: Unlike Vivian, Grim is more of a cute cuddly shadow girl that has to live with Vivian in order to survive. She is more of a happy go lucky person, but if you make her angry, she becomes more sinister that evil Vivian is afraid of her. However Grim is very friendly if you let her be and not mess with her. She also deeply cares for her owner.

Other info: Due to her origin and how she came upon mortal world, there are giant shadow creatures that followed will attack and Grim and Vivian will have to face them. Also Grim could giggles in a growling way.

Bio: The military were testing something beyond the mortal world and as a result created a shadow like creature that escapes killing some solders in the process. The creature could not live in the sunlight without a host and that's when she met Vivian. She disguised herself as her shadow and revealed herself when the girl was alone. And so Grim stays with Vivian as her shadow and would grow about 175ft if a giant threat appears.
114.title: Open Spot

choices: Watching a movie, don't want to miss it
Plan for revenge, it could be my chance
1142.content:
After escaping the military base, the Shadow Kaiju wander off with no direction. She tried to hide from the public and disguises herself as other shadows. It was daylight so she needs a host to stay alive. When suddenly she was caught by Vivian, the girl who is the main protagonist of this story, in an alley.

The girl looked at the Shadow Kaiju move and the girl showed no fear except some excitement.

"Wow, are you like a shadow monster? I never met a monster in real life.", asked Vivian.

The shadow nodded and seem to like her a bit more. She then shrunk down to Vivian size and act as her shadow, The shadow then looked at Vivian with some interest.

"You need a host. Well you can live with me if you want since your pretty friendly and cool. Also my name is Vivian."

The shadow was happy to hear this, but suddenly a boy appeared and pushed Vivian. He was pretty big and all. Vivian stumbled back and gazed at the bully.

"Who are you talking to purple?", asked the bully.

He continued to harass the young girl until the shadow had enough. The shadow grew at tall height or as tall as a regular Kaiju girl. The shadow formed a beast like form and roared. The whole place got dark and the bully decided to run. The shadow grabbed him and ate him whole. She then spits him out as he flew out of the alley.

The alley then turned from a hellish darkness place to a regular alley. The Shadow then shrunk down and in the shape of Vivian again. The girl was amazed at that and said.

"Wow your so amazing. Where were you in my life?", asked Vivian.

The shadow gave a gesture of modesty.

"Do you have a name?", asked the girl.

The shadow shock her head.

"How about I name you Grim based on what you did?"

The shadow nodded with glee.

"Okay, let's go home."

Grim followed Vivian like most shadows do and then went to a home that has bight colors. Apparently it really contrast with Vivian's dark shade of clothes.

"Welcome to you new home Grim.", said Vivian.

The shadow looked at the bright furniture which made it flinch a bit. The girl notice this and then guided the shadow to her room which is the exact opposite of what the house it. Vivian's room is filled with horror based things such as action figures, DVD sets, posters, books, and all kinds of weird stuff. The shadow seems to like this more.

"I'm glad you like my room. Sorry if you don't like the rest of my house. My parents has this taste for bright colors.", said Vivian.

So far her parents aren't home and she has homework which she finishes first as fast as she could while trying to entertain Shadow a bit. She let Grim play with her action figures and tries to make sure that they don't break.

After that's done, she then found a note on the refrigerator that says that her parents are out for the night and dinner is in the fridge. She thought about watching a horror flick on T.V. and eat popcorn instead of leftovers. She could do this with a friend for once since Grim wasn't afraid of her like most people. Then suddenly a thought strikes through her mind.

She could use Grim's powers to get back at the kids in school. They always have bullied her about her interest and how she is a witch. She might take sometime to plan her revenge. So Vivian thought about...
1142.title: Let's begin with how they met

11421.content:
Vivian then remembered that her favorite movie is on tonight and seriously does not want to miss it. Besides, getting revenge would make her be just as bad as those people in school. She prepares the popcorn and got Grim with her.

She turns on the television showing Grim her favorite movie, "The Monster Mist".

"This is my favorite movie because everyone turns into a monster because of mist. Man I wish I can be a monster. I don't care how inconvenient it is.", said Vivian.

Grim should some gestures and growls on how she should appreciate on how she looks since Grim like looking like Vivian. The girl had some hard time listening to her and then the girl passed the popcorn. Grim grabbed a handful and at some and like it.

"You like it. Have some more.", said Vivian.

The shadow Kaiju grabbed more popcorn and proceeded in watching the movie. So far it features a girl turning into a beast and being attacked by people who are also slowly turning into monsters. This made Grim worried about Vivian based on how her friends treat her. Grim hoped that she could keep her new friend safe since she offered herself to be her host.

After the movie, Vivian was happy while Grim hugged her.

"Aw Grim, its not real. Its just a horror flick.", said Vivian.

Grim held on to the girl and then got up from the couch and went to bed. Grim slept next to her host in bed and the lights went off.

That night, Vivian heard something like a screaming. It sounds as if there was some suffering. It was a dream of course since Vivian knows that she is sleeping. She saw many lost souls crying and moaning and then the girl woke up.

She continued to hear the screaming, but its faint. She got closer to her shadow friend and found out that it was all in there. She shook Grim and asked her about it.

"Grim, is it true that you steal people's souls?"

Grim growl with some regret in her voice and showing Vivian on how sorry she is and how she is trying to defend herself. This instead made Vivian more excited.

"Wow, a real reaper of souls in my room. This is amazing. Could you suck my soul out for a bit and put me back in my body?", said Vivian.

Grim shock her head with disappointment, and pointed out that its really dangerous and scary. She even pointed out through gestures that it could really damage her soul.

"Fine Grim, thanks for caring for me at least.", said Vivian, "I just like creepy stuff like the things in my room."

Grim only gave her a thumbs up and then...
11421.title: Watching a movie, don't want to miss it

choices: Grim give Mandy her soul back
114212.content:
Vivian woke up and ate breakfast with her family. Grim stayed as Vivian's shadow acts like one to not cause attention. Unlike the girl herself, her parents are rosy and really positive. Her father had a 70s look with a business suit and tie. Her mother is a bit thick boned, but looks really happy and jolly with her crazy looking hair.

"Good morning sweetie, its a great day today huh.", asked her dad.

"Yes father. It's sunny as usual and its kind of a bad thing since it hasn't rain for a while and we need rain to regain water for our lakes and ponds.", said Vivian.

"That's very interesting, you like the rain more than a sunny day. Ever weather has its own beauties.", said her father.

Vivian just ate her pancakes and fed Grim some while her parents aren't looking. The girl and her Shadow twin then left for the school bus and waited at the stop only to be pushed by a girl that is taller than her. She is basically those type of girls that always act as if their superior.

"Mandy, I'm not in the mood right now.", said Vivian.

"What? Your useless shell just get in my way. Am I interrupting your Satanic day dreaming?", said Mandy.

"For the record, I'm not into Satan, I'm into monsters. Big difference."

Mandy then pushed her again.

"Whoops, just an accident. I think your shoe is untied.", said Mandy.

Vivian did and remembers that she wore slippers and Mandy just her finger at her.

"Oh sorry, I'm so clumsy today.", said Mandy.

Vivian growled. Grim saw this and decided to go big. The shadow grew about 300ft tall out of anger surprising everyone. The school bus came and everyone in it saw the monster at its best. Grim reached down and sucked Mandy's soul away.

Vivian just stood there thinking if this is a good or bad thing. And was only amazed to see Grim at her finest. Vivian then decided that...
114212.title: In the morning

1142121.content:
Everyone was now afraid of Vivian. Mandy's body was left laying there. Grim picks it up and store it inside of her. The goth girl got into the bus with Grim shrunken down and everyone looks at her. Vivian looks at Grim and gave her a smile. Grim just gave a giggle as they sat in the back of the bus.

School was a bit easier than before for Vivian. Everyone gave her the respect she wants. She demands everyone to not give her special treatment and wanted to be treated normally. To some bullies that she knows that kept messing with her, Vivian threatens them with Grim and have the shadow Kaiju grow to scare them off.

After school, Vivian goes home and found out that her parents are at work. She decided to use this chance to have some fun with Mandy. Grim reveals her Mandy's soul and Vivian decided to talk to her.

"This my chance for vengeance. After all these years since first grade, you will face my wrath.", said Vivian.

"Please let me go! I don't want to go to hell.", said Mandy's soul.

"How many times do I have to tell you that my stuff isn't Satanic? Today, I will show you some Voodoo.", said Vivian.

The girl got a doll and Grim puts Mandy's soul in it. Vivian proceeds to poke the doll with needles, hearing Mandy scream in pain. Vivian gave a smile of joy as she loves getting her vengeance. She then transfer the soul into some putty as she kept squishing it.

After a while, Grim puts Mandy's soul back into her body.

"Now remember that bullying is not okay and what I do is not Satanic.", said Vivian.

"I'm so sorry. Please just leave me alone.", said Mandy.

The girl ran off and Vivian just sat there with Grim in her room. Looking at the door that leads to a path of a new life.
1142121.title: Mandy's soul is mine forever

12.content: Here are some character spots for you.
12.title: Character Spot

choices: Go back to how they first meet
Have them playing with their friends
Have them going to the beach
121.content:
Human Girl
Name: Sonia Sela
Age: 11
Hair Style and Color: Purplish red hair that is like Sonia Strumms
Eye Color: Green
Skin: Pale
Breast Size: A or B Cups as you will see in the picture
Clothes: Black shirt with a heart symbol, blue jeans, red shoes and socks
Personality: Always the odd one of the group. She is kind, playful, lovable, and caring, she did wish she had a big sister. Does enjoy playing with her giant monster self though, and likes teasing her.
Bio: This girl always wished she had a big sister that she can relate to. She had some friends at her school, but she always seemed odd. She does fine at school, but never really stands out. However, one day, she really stood out, when a giant monster came to the city, and came to her school one day. She was frightened at first, but then the monster girl came to her, and it looked just like her. They have one heck of a friendship ever since, and the two are close like sisters ever since.

/

Monster Girl
Monster Name: Soniazilla
Height: 150ft tall
Clothes for the monster: Red one-piece swimsuit as of now (Hey, there isn't alot they can do at the time), please disregard the picture next chapter
Powers: Roaring like a monster, high invulerability, breathening fire
Personality differences: She is more playful than the original Sonia, and she even likes being mischevious on her, like roaring to wake her up, etc. She is also really protective of Sonia, heck, even grunting and growling when anyone comes near her, although she did learn to accept some friends.
Other info: Sonia decided her name would be Soniazilla, and she likes it.
Bio: She was the military weapon that escaped and she came to the city, and she knew where Sonia was. She did gave the city a huge scare at the time, but the moment she meant Sonia, they became close as sisters. She might be her big sister, but also she is young at the same time, with her inexperiences, but Sonia sure helps her. She also is old like her in the mind because of how much she protects her, and how she means to her in her life now. Thankfully the government and people no longer fear her.

What to do now?
121.title: Sonia and Soniazilla

1211.content:
http://krizeii.deviantart.com/art/Sonia-...

Okay, now we can start.
1211.title: Go back to how they first meet

12111.content:
-Military base-

The military base were making the siren around the area. The military people were scruffling around to get ready and on the other sides, the general was walking down the area with commander. The generals name Thompson, head of the united states army and he was upset about what was going on.

"Lieutenant biggs! I thought you were taking care of the giant monster!" General thompons said.

"I did, sir! The giant monster have somehow destroyed the wires that put her down!" Lieutenant biggs replied.

They were walking fast and once they got to the room they saw a huge hole on the wall infront of them. The area were where they capture anything that was unusual to the human society and keep them to examine them. General Thompson gritted his teeth and turned to lieutenant biggs.

"I want you to call the secretary of defence and tell him the monster escaped." General Thompson said, "And tell him to permit the cyber assassins."


"But...cyber assassins are-" Lieutenant biggs spoke.

"It's the emergency, dang it! do it now!!" Thompson shouted to him.

"Y-yes sir!"

The lieutenant then hurried off to call the secretary of defence. General Thompson stood to think of the plan. Somewhere in the world, one unknown identity rose up from the shores. The identity looked around and noticed it was at the coast of.....
12111.title: Start!

121111.content:
It appeared in Tokyo, Japan. Thankfully the army of Japan was able to evucate the city and its civilians just before the monster was able to appear in the city. The identity that rose up was some sort of a red hair girl with green eyes, appearing to be 10 years old, and was wearing a red one-piece swimsuit outfit. It towers at 150ft tall, and was roaring like a female Godzilla just as it proceeds to try to walk towards the city. The entire military begins to shoot the monster with their weapons at her, but to no avail.

The giant monster girl was trying to cover herself from all sorts of fire that the army is blasting on her, but it was to no avail. Heck, it makes her so mad that she even decided to show off her power by attempting to fire-breath the area. She fires some flames from her mouth and took out some of her enemies, and then she proceeds to walk through into the city. Not caring for what gets crushed, or whatever.... eventually the giant monster girl would stop at a...
121111.title: Japan

1211111.content:
She stopped at the local highschool. She smiled and laughed, pointing at the school as many people coming out of the building running for their life. She breathed in and spewed out an fire, burning the building. The kaijyu girl roared loud as it started to stomp on the people. She got some, some she didn't. She then turned around to have more fun.

Her next destination were..
1211111.title: School

12111111.content:
Right now, we see a girl who was waiting for dear life to get onto a new fun ride in the amusement park. The girl looks like this image (http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...) and her name is Sonia. (Note that Sonia strumm is not in the image, but I am using her image appearance with the green eyes, etc). "Man, I am really looking forward to getting to ride that new Kaiju Rider!" she smiled, just as she looks at the big amusement ride that she is about to ride. Thankfully she is tall enough to ride the ride, but then the emergency alarm starts to go off, causing everyone to panic.

"This is an emergency! A giant girl monster is rampaging the city, please evacuate immediately." the alarm system said, and everyone started to run like crazy. "What is the fuss all about?" Sonia thought, just as she pulls out the phone and sees a new broadcast of the giant girl monster, heading to the amusement park. She is shocked to find out that the girl looks almost exactly like her, and was in a red one-piece swimsuit.

"Oh boy, this is incredible. I better check it out." Sonia said, running toward where the monster girl is heading...
12111111.title: An unexpected surprise

121111111.content:
Once the kaiju girl arrived at the amusement park, she was ready to wreck havoc. She started to flail her arms and kick many buildings with her legs. Many buildings were destroyd and she turned to the Ferris wheel. She came to it and grabbed it, putting some strength and pulled it off, then threw it off to the side. She roared loudly and was about to wreck more havoc until she heard someone's voice. She turned and looked down, only to realize it was Sonia herself.

"Stop with what you are doing now!" Sonia shouted.

The kaiju didn't hear her words and continued to wreck havoc. Sonia gotten annoyed by this and tried to stop the kaiju but with no avail until she noticed a person in brown monks cloth. She didn't know who this person were then the person walked toward her and stopped.

"Um...who are you?" Sonia asked.

The person looked at Sonia for moment. She could tell the person were a white male with blue eyes and black short hair. She felt that she knew him before, then the man dug something in his arm socket and took out a crystal and handed to her.

"You shall use this to quell the kaiju and become your ally." Man said.

Sonia were surprised to hear this and then the man turned around and left the scene. She felt that this was not the last time she would see him. She then turned around and lifted her arm up with the crystal and it shined brightly. The kaiju felt the warmth within her chest and turned to see the girl only to realize what she was doing and tried to prevent her, but it was too late as the light engulfed her, the kaiju were reprogramed to be taimed under her.
121111111.title: leader and followers

choices: Sonia then tests her new power with Soniazilla
1211111111.content:
"Okay now... okay now.... settle down. Everything is going to be okay now.... kaiju girl." Sonia said a bit nervously just as she starts to get closer and closer to the kaiju girl with the crystal in her hand. "Don't worry, everything is alright now. There is no need to worry, let me just get closer to you and everything will be alright." Sonia smiled to her just as she walks closer and closer to the giant swimsuit-clad version of herself. The monster girl then grabbed her (with her screaming a bit) and then begins to.... hug her around her bikini area. The monster girl then growls gently.

"Wow, this is unexpected." Sonia said, caught off by surprise by the monster girl's reaction of just adoring her. "Say, everything is going to be alright my friend.... but I wonder, what should I call you?" Sonia thought with a smile just as she tries to think for a name for the giant monster girl, then she got one in her head. "Soniazilla!" Sonia suddenly said.

The monster girl then roars happily and then stands at her full height. Sonia then felt something strange happening to the crystal, somehow it glows brightly and turns into a ball of light that goes inside of Sonia herself. "Is my crystal merging with me?" Sonia thought, just as the crystal goes inside of her, after the light faded away, Soniazilla looks at Sonia with concern.

"Wow... that was unexpected. Say... sit!" Sonia ordered, then Soniazilla sits right near Sonia herself. "Good monster girl."

What happens next?
1211111111.title: New friend

choices: A bit of an issue happens between Sonia and the commander, and Soniazilla reacts
The commander believes her, and takes Sonia and Soniazilla to the base
12111111111.content:
Just as Sonia somehow managed to tame the kaiju girl and named her Soniazilla, the miltary was now showing up in their military vehicles, soldiers, and whatever else you can imagine in a normal army. Soniazilla growled at the military and picks up Sonia and keeps Sonia close to her. Sonia wondered why the... oh wait, they are here for the monster girl to take her out, and Sonia is now worried.

"Kaiju girl, I order you to let the girl out now, or we will open fire." they ordered. Soniazilla growls again and prepares to fire her fire breath at them and roast them, but Sonia then tells her. "Just let me go, and I will explain everything to them." Sonia ordered. Soniazilla then does what she was ordered to do. It seems that crystal power is now inside of Sonia, and now Sonia has full control over Soniazilla for certain powers. The part where Soniazilla grabbed Sonia was meant for protection from harm.

"Uh... commander. There is no need to worry now. The kaiju girl, or I mean since I narmed her now... Soniazilla, is now under my control." Sonia told the commander, and to show him, Sonia turns to Soniazilla and orders her to stand up, which she does.

"Young girl, you need to get out of here, that creature is dangerous, and our cyber-assassins are already about to strike her down." the commander told her, refusing to believe that she has control.

"No, it's fine, I can control the beast. Soniazilla, roar!" Sonia said the first part to the commander, then for the roar she turned to Soniazilla, and she roared like the vicious beast that she is.

What happens now?
12111111111.title: The military shows up

http://krizeii.deviantart.com/art/Sonia-...

Okay, now we can start.
1212.title: Have them playing with their friends

13.content: Here are some character spots for you.
13.title: Character Spots

choices: Start the story for these two
131.content:
Human Girl

Name: Leila

Age: 13

Hair style and color: sun-bleached blond in a low ponytail

Eye color: Amber

Skin: tanned brown (formally olive)

Breast size: C

Clothes: a short, purple, sleeveless blouse and a short grey skirt along with black, low-heel, calf-high boots.

Personality: arrogant, self-centered, cocky, narcissistic, shallow, and conceited, as well as a major flirt.

Bio: She always calls people hon, sweetie, or dear, without ever really meaning it.he's also a tyrant and has no qualms about using others to do what she wants. She enjoys exploiting her abilities and hates those who prove her wrong making everyone dislike or become scared of her. A mall rat what can't stand any setting that's not a city, she can't stand the fact that she was made to go on a camping trip. But that changed when she learns about Trish and her ability to partially control her. Since learning that, she envisions herself as an empress with Trish serving as her enforcer.


******


Monster Girl

Name or Monster Name: Trish aka "Artemis"

Age: 13

Hair style and color: long, silky, dark auburn hair kept up behind her in a high ponytail

Eye color: Silver

Skin: olive

Breast size: C

Height: 500 feet

Clothes: a pale green sleevless vest somewhat similar to a flak jacket with a silvery parka over it, camouflage-patterned pants, and hunting boots.

Powers: Antimatter Manipulation- able to generate and manipulate antimatter, (comes off her as a violet-glowing energy/aura.), Umbrakinesis-the ability to mentally generate and manipulate darkness,

(Links to powers:
http://powerlisting.wikia.com/wiki/Antim...
http://powerlisting.wikia.com/wiki/Darkn...)

Personality deviations: Since she's a giantess, she's developed a very conservative attitude about things, and (fortunately) a very outdoor-type of personality, she tries to be as pacifistic as possible, given how easy it is for her to hurt others. Rather focused with a much greater understanding of things. She's largely independent and doesn't like being told what to do, since it makes her feel that she's viewed as a means to an end for others to exploit rather than a person. She loves hunting and is highly sympathetic, and weighs individuals by their actions and choices as opposed to their potential. But she can have a rather beastial savagery, coolness, and pitlessness when she's provoked into it. Her powers (specifically her antimatter powers) make her worried for just that reason, since she understand that it is important to note that when matter and antimatter collide, they will both annihilate each other, making this a very dangerous power to both user and target. Because of this, it takes extreme force of will on the part of the user to stop this from happening, and essentially stabilize antimatter.

Other info: Weakness of Lunacy power regulation- her powers increase and decrease accordingly with the moon phases. When there is full moon her powers are at peak capacity. That, added onto her outdoor-type appearance and personality, earned her the nickname "Artemis"

Bio: A thirteen-year-old girl with a love the outdoors. When she was made a giantess, she found that to serve her best to avoid trouble for "Normal people". She'd been trying to gain mastery over her powers since then. Trish tries to avoid normal people when they go camping, but when she learns about Leila, she's horrified to learn that she can upsurt control of her body.
131.title: Day & Night

choices: Trish notices someone in the captured food stalk (a human)
Several human hunters just saw a giant creature
1311.content:
Currently out in the dense woods (that is increased to Trish's size) we see a towering being roaring and growling throughout the woods. This caused all sorts of animals to flock in the opposite direction of the creature that is chasing them. The creature was a towering beast for sure. Standing in at 500ft tall, with long, silky, dark auburn hair kept up behind it in a high pony tale, olive skin, and with silver eyes. The monster was wearing some sort of pale green seleevless somewhat similiar to a flak jacket with a slivery parka over it, campouflafe-patterened pants, and hunting boots. This monster, was none other than Trish.

Trish was currently hunting for food to keep her from starving to death. She was walking in the direction that they were running, (birds, bears, etc) and soon they reach and opened field, and then that is where the trap was spranged. Somehow there was a big net underneeth the animals and now Trish pulled the trap (don't get me started on dynamics here). The animals were now trapped, and Trish was now ready to start cooking and start eating. However, things were about to get out of hand soon... real soon.

What happens now?
1311.title: A Monster Food Gathering

15.content: Here are some character spots for you.
15.title: Character Spots

info.brief_description: A girl has a giant monster version of herself as a pet.
info.description:
Here is a strange story. It involves a military experiment to make monster giantesses and use then as weapons of war. Many have failed and one succeeded, but with some completely odd results. They got the DNA with a blood donation drive that would be used to make the giant monster giantess. Many have failed, and few have succeeded. However, they resisted their creators, and they escaped. The monster was reported to be completely powerful, and that nothing can stop it.

Then imagine the next day, the giant monster girl stops at a place where the girl who looks exactly like her. She is a human giantess, but with a few powers, but that comes down to the decisions made by you. The giantess has the same personality as the person who is give or take a few minor things. Also, the giant monster girl becomes the pet of the human girl, and how they treat her is up to you. The city could get along with the creature, or something else could happen, and its all up to you.

Think of it, a human girl having her pet giant monster girl (Girlzilla since she is human). The monster girl can only roar and growl.

Here is the format for making characters, you will make one for your character and for the monster girl

/

Personality:

(I know, not the best format to use, but they do share details so they are made easy to understand)

/

Rules:

NO GIANTESS UNDER THE AGE OF AT LEAST 13 CAN WEAR A BIKINI

No Male Giants
No Gay/Lesbian Stuff
18+ content if you told me ahead of time and will be done on notes, other than that, all of them are PG-13 or less
No nudity unless it is 18 Plus
You can do more than one giantess up to 3
No scat or toilet stuff, I cannot stand that.
